name: Huke
description:
Ludum Dare #42, theme: Running out of Space.

In Huke, your goal is to reach the end of the level without getting hit. You move around with mouse, using only your trusty grapple.

Controls: 

Left click: attach grapple 

Right click: release grapple 

Esc: quit game

 Sensitivity can be adjusted in the menu

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/huke
